description: This may work for A3, A4 and A5 sizes but is not useful if you want to create letter, legal and 11x17-inch sizes. It should also let the user pick the panels to fit a page size. For example, I have 3 pages each 11 inches tall and 5.67 inches wide and want to combine (1 x 3) onto a single 11x17-inch (tabloid) size paper (landscape).
summary: OK, but needs to support letter, legal and 11x17-inch sizes

description:
Great interface... simple but powerful.

It is, however, highly eurocentric, as output is only A3, A4, or A5. It really should allow for arbitrary sizes or at least the set [A3-A5, B3-B5, Letter (8.5x11 inch), Legal (8.5x14 inch), Digest (5.5x8.5 inch), and 11x17 inch]. (Note that many churches' bulletins are printed on legal to make a 7.5x8.5 inch single-fold.)(Most print houses in the US can print 11x17, as can many office printers.)

Completely mangled my digest (5.5x8.5 inch) with ¼ inch borders in forcing it onto A4... the top ½ of text was off the page. Lots of potential, the exact kind of cuntionality i wanted, but not well executed.
summary: Excellent interface, but too Eurocentric and limited

description: all pages are out of order...
Esta aplicación te puede ayudar a hacer folletos si tu impresora no te da la opción en sus opciones al imprimir.
summary: Es muy buena y no tiene ni comentarios

description: Not perfect, but it works. From pdf to A5 pdf booklet to print
Pratique car cette application permet de répéter 1 page facilement. On peut ainsi, à partir d'un PDF d'une seule page, la dupliquer en mettant 2 exemplaires par page (faire d'un A4, deux A5).
Хорошая программа. Выручала не раз. Ничего лишнего. Свою работу выполняет
Наконец-то можно буклеты делать без проблем
